fulltext:
Le Khac Viet 
29th Jan, 1986 
Phone: 0905 055 863 | Email address: kv.netcoding@gmail.com 
Solution Architect/Technical Architect 
Summary 
• 
Over 9 years of professional experience in development of web-based applications using Java 
technology. 
• 
Over 3 years of professional experience in development of web-based applications using NodeJS, 
Angular JS technology. 
• 
Over 1 year of professional experience in development of IoT applications using Predix platform. 
• 
Ability to communicate directly with abroad customer using English 
• 
Mastering in design, structure source code for web-based applications using Java and NodeJS. 
• 
Experienced using design patterns. 
• 
Working as Solution Architect, Technical Architect, Senior Fullstack developer for both Java and NodeJS 
technology. 
• 
Experienced in restructuring existing system. 
• 
A lot of maintained experience 
• 
Experienced using content management tools: Git, SVN or VSS. 
• 
Experienced using digest authentication, OAuth2, CORS. 
• 
Ability to adapt to new technologies/environment quickly. 
Technical Skill 
• 
Programming languages, Tools and Frameworks 
o Java, J2EE, Servlet/JSP 
o Javascript, Node JS, Angular JS 2/4, ExpressJS and relevant libraries. 
o Spring Core, Spring MVC, Spring Boot, Struts 2, Hibernate, Apache Spark 
o Web Service: RESTful, SOAP 
o SQL 
o Quartz Scheduler 
o Apache POI, Jasper Report 
• 
Application servers 
o Tomcat, Websphere, NgInx, PM2 
• 
Databases 
o Oracle, PostgreSQL, MySQL 
o Elastic Search, Redis, MongoDB 
• 
IDE 
o Netbeans, Eclipse, Intellij, Visual Code Insider 
• 
Others 
o Maven, XML, XPath, JSON, Jackson Mapper, Bootstrap, Jquery, NPM 
• 
Content Management Tools 
o Git, SVN, VSS 
• 
Operating Systems 
o Windows, Mac OSX, Linux 
Professional experience 
Dec 2016 – Present 
Solution Architect at FPT Software Hochiminh 
Client: General Electric, StarHub, Wurldtech, Shiseido, Airbus 
Projects: Wind Farm Management, ChatBot, Cyber Security and Manufacturing Executive System. 
I'm responsible for: 
• 
Pre-sale activities (Provide proposals, estimations) 
• 
Provide Software Architecture Documents 
• 
Technology consulting 
• 
Architect, design, structure source code for projects 
• 
Support critically technical issues 
On 
• 
GE Predix Cloud platform 
• 
AWS Cloud platform 
• 
IoT-based applications 
• 
Microservice-based, monolithic-based applications 
Projects descriptions 
• 
Wind Farm Management (WFM) application is an IoT based application.  In America, there’re a lot of turbines 
that need to be tracked, monitored to check whether any issues occurred. In WFM, for example we used the 
TimeSeries service that provided by GE Predix Platform to do the tracking or monitoring data that pushed by 
sensors. Data after that visualized for web users for controlling. 
• 
Chatbot application is an NLP (Natural Language Processing) application. StarHub has a lot of template email 
that will be sent to customer for confirmation, ask question, run survey campaign,… Therefore, they want to 
build an software which supports to communicate directly with their customer instead of people interception. 
• 
Cyber Security Standard Assessment (SSA) application is a micro service-based application. Wurldtech customer 
using SSA (Security Standard Assessment) application to assess the security maturities then provide the 
assessment results to customer for improving or fixing security issues that shouldn’t be existed in the system. 
We’ve decided to use Java Spring Boot, NodeJS and Angular JS 2 for the solution approach. 
• 
MES (Manufacturing Executive System) is not only a application but huge system. It is center layer in Industry 
4.0. In which, they can control, monitor, intercept, … entire manufacturing processes, ranging from logistic, ERP, 
production control, production processes, packaging,…  
Technologies used  
• 
Programming languages and frameworks: 
o Spring Boot, Hibernate, Maven, Apache POI, NodeJS, Express JS, Angular JS 2, Bootstrap, PostgreSQL, GE 
Predix services, NPM libraries 
• 
Deployment Server 
o Tomcat 9, NgInx, PM2, Electron 
• 
Test 
o Junit, Istanbul, Mocha 
o PostMan – a Chrome REST client 
Apr 2016 – Dec 2016 
Technical Leader at CMC Software 
Client: Vietinbank 
Projects: Loyalty portal 
I’m responsible for: 
• 
Design, architect and structure the source code from the scratch 
• 
Coding 
• 
Conduct daily meeting for tracking tasks, issues 
• 
Technology consulting for other Java applications that implementing by other teams 
• 
Support critically technical issues 
Project descriptions 
• 
The customer (a bank in Vietnam) wants to build a web-based application which delivers Loyalty functionality to 
their customers (bank customers). Whenever a bank customer done a transaction, they have a change which 
counted by points, then they can used those points and get the items they desire. 
• 
The item catalogue which the bank provided in the application comes from their partners. The bank doesn’t 
manage those catalogues but partners. And they are using the code interpreter to make the business work. 
Thus, after the item is changed completely, the bank customer can use the generated code and go to partner’s 
store and get that item. 
• 
The bank has 3 existing applications and they want Member Portal developers integrate all of them together. 
They are Internet Banking, Loyalty and SOA application.  
Technologies Used: 
• 
Programming languages and frameworks: 
o Java, Spring 4, Log4j2, RESTful, SOAP, Angular JS 2, HTML, CSS 
• 
Deployment servers: 
o Tomcat 8 
• 
Test 
o Junit 
o PostMan – a Chrome REST client 
July 2014 – Mar 2016 
Technical Leader at CMC Software 
Client: SISTIC 
Projects: Ticketing System 
I’m responsible for: 
• 
Capture requirement, revise the solution and send this to customer for confirmation.  
• 
Research new technologies which client needs. 
Restructure the system. 
Coding. 
Conduct daily meeting. 
Support team members to fix critical issues. 
Review code for members before committing. 
Support project team members for technical issues. 
Merge code. 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
• 
Project descriptions 
• 
This is not only project, but also an operational work. SISTIC is a largest ticketing service and solution provider in 
Singapore. It sells tickets ranging from pop concerts, musical, theatre, family entertainment and sports. SISTIC’s 
Authorised Agents are located in Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, India, Taiwan, Vietnam and Thailand. 
• 
The project consists of 3 parts, a booking engine network, a main backend application and an ACS (Access 
Control System) network. The architecture is just simple, 3 parts are communicated with each other via 
SOAP/RESTful services (SOAP is for back-compatible functionalities).  
• 
End users can do the booking directly on the web. They can choose seats visually; choose the promotion price, 
expected delivery, payment methods and ticket protector etc. 
• 
Venue, seat map, price, delivery methods, all of the things can be configured in the backend application and 
serving to booking engine apps via RESTful services. 
• 
New business will be configured in properties file for adhoc deployments. 
Technologies Used: 
• 
Programming languages and frameworks: 
o Java, JSP/Servlet, Spring 4, Spring MVC 4, Hibernate 4, Struts 1.2, Jasper Report 4.6.1, Quartz, Log4j, 
Apache POI, HTML, CSS, Jquery 
o Web Services: SOAP, REST. 
• 
Deployment server: 
o Websphere 8, Tomcat 7. 
• 
Test 
o JUnit. 
o SoapUI, REST Advanced Client for testing web services. 
Jan 2013 – June 2014 
Senior Java Developer at FPT Software Danang 
Client: HITACHI 
Project: Population Management 
I’m responsible for: 
• 
Using design patterns, best practices and common usage, build abstract classes as well as interfaces for project 
team. 
• 
Conduct a daily meeting 
• 
Compose/modify common documents (convention docs, business docs, comment docs) 
• 
Web meeting with BrSE to clear requirement 
• 
Be a member of team lead meetings to solve difficult issues 
• 
Do a super review for deliverables. 
• 
Support project team members for technical issues. 
• 
Do unit test before merge the code into SVN for deliverables. 
• 
Create assistant documents (time management, issue management, bug trends management, quality 
management, resources management) 
Project descriptions 
• 
This project is a migration project. Client wants to migrate an desktop-based application to web-based 
application 
• 
The project is population management in Japan; some domains are Japanese citizenship, marriage process, all 
about population management processes. 
• 
The hardest point of the project is from the migration, VB6 is migrated to Java, learn basic VB6 code, read and 
understand code, create code categories and put each line of code into right category, and then do the 
migration. 
Technologies Used: 
• 
Programming languages and frameworks: 
o Java, JSP/Servlet, Struts 1, Log4j, JDBC, HTML, CSS, Jquery 
• 
Deployment Server 
o Tomcat 7, Cosminexus 
• 
Test 
o Junit, JTest 
o Maula coverage 
Jan 2010 – Dec 2012 
A lot of small applications… 
Education & Certification 
• 
Higher Diploma in Software Engineering at Aptech Global. 
Thanks for watching, 
Le Khac Viet

educations.major_categories: Máy tính và công nghệ thông tin
